sleep_info:
When sleep mode is enabled, application will free device
control socket when them isn't used. This will reduce count
of menu updates, reduce device battery usage. But state information
will be updated with some delay.

Restart application to apply these changes.
application_running_message:
Application already running, check status area.

 If app don't response, stop it from system task manager, 
and then try again.
first_run_message:
This app don't have window, it displays only in status area.

Right click on headset icon in tray to set up.
gesture_auto_pause: Pause/play when you plug out headphone
change_hotkey_message:
Enter key that you want to use for this action.
Note: you must enter just one litter, for example.
And then you will be able to run this action with Ctrl-Alt and your litter.
hotkeys_wayland:
Global hotkeys won't work correctly under Wayland.

We can't fix it for now, this is limitation of Wayland. But you can use 
web-server to create hotkeys manually.

Visit app website for more information.
server_global_warn:
ATTENTION!

This feature will allow anyone from your local network to control
your FreeBuds device, and also can create a security violence.
Enable this feature only if you know what you do.

Enable external access to web server?
error_force_action_fail: Error: OS can't connect this device.
win_tools_message:
To use this feature, you must install "Bluetooth Command Line Tools"
from bluetoothinstaller.com. Without this, you can't use connect/disconnect
features on Windows. Notice that this software is provided "as is" and don't
give any warranty of any kind.

For more information, visit https://bluetoothinstaller.com

Also note, that this tools may not work on newer versions of MS Windows, like ver. 11.
Open browser to download installer?
profile_select_message:
This device isn't supported, for yet. But if you want,
you cant force connect them. To do that, select an exiting
profile. Then application will try to apply it to your 
device. You can change profile in any time.

Notice that this may be dangerous for some kind of devices.
Do it of your risk. You also can share information about your
device and selected profile at GitHub, if you want get offical
support.
